content: in this legal case a dispute arose over the termination of a private contract related to the construction of a building the perugia court issued a final ruling in favor of one party granting them full ownership of a real estate property the court also ordered the dissolution of the community property and the allocation of ownership shares additional pleadings were allowed and a technical consultancy was conducted to determine the value of the property however a request for a technical expertise regarding economic evaluation was rejected after failed attempts at an amicable settlement the court ordered the sale of the property the judgment was appealed and the court awarded the entire real estate property to one party along with the surplus the court declared a partial simulation of a notarial deed and divided the ownership of the property equally between the parties the court also considered the expenses incurred by the plaintiff and the exclusive use of the property the value of the property was determined and ownership shares were allocated accordingly the costs of the technical consultancy were divided equally between the parties the court made a final decision on may 6 2019 granting full ownership of the property to one party and dismissing any claims made by the opposing party both parties will be responsible for their own litigation costs with each party paying 50 of the expenses the case number is 1097242004 rg
